content: ": "XQ", "source": "FDDC" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getFuelMilestones ``` # Fuel Summary Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/ground/fuelSummary/{regId} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "regId": "BLMX", "fuelSummaries": [ { "extraInfo": "Fuel Summary Info", "flightId": "20221101-XQ-185", "udor": "2022-11-01", "udorLocal": "2022-11-01", "carrier": "XQ", "flightNumber": "185", "suffix": "*", "departureAirport": "DUS", "arrivalAirport": "AYT", "activityType": "Refuelling", "productType": "JetA1", "fuelEquipmentId": "VEH1000", "receiptId": "0000011111", "deliveryDate": "2022-11-01T08:20:00Z", "agentCode": "SKY", "supplierCode": "OMV", "density": 100, "densityType": "MEA", "densityUnit": "Litre", "quantity": 100, "quantityUnit": "Litre", "handlerCode": "PEO", "requestingFuelCarrier": "XQ", "source": "FDDC" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getFuelSummaries ``` # PAX Airport Operation Data Model ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/ground/paxAirportOperations/{flightId} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "flightId": "20221101-XQ-185", "paxAirportOperations": [ { "extraInfo": "Pax Airport Operation", "regId": "TCSPO", "udor": "2022-11-01", "carrier": "XQ", "flightNumber": "980", "departureAirport": "ADB", "arrivalAirport": "VIE", "direction": "Departure", "terminal": "1", "checkInCounter": "18-28", "baggageBelt": "82", "boardingStartDate": "2022-11-01T08:20:00Z", "gate": "111", "source": "TAV" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getPaxAirportOperations ```
